LanguageData.GerzeeSlaveSurvivors.label: Gerzee Slave Survivors
LanguageData.GerzeeSlaveSurvivors.description: A colony of escaped Gerzee slaves, banded together and trying to survive.
LanguageData.GerzeeWrathful.label: Gerzee Wrathful
LanguageData.GerzeeWrathful.description: Gerzee that mentally snapped from years of mistreatment as slaves, and are now very willing to hurt anything that isn't a part of their new tribe.
